feed.title: Dozzle Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.10
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes alerts on mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3819 (18c87)
  • Fixes sql analytics when error occurs  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3820 (d98b8)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.11
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Uses brotli on the fly for static files and gzip for streaming  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3825 (ccfab)
  • Makes homepage more responsive and adds some borders for better visibility  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3837 (433c0)
  • Improves dropdowns for other containers  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3840 (01343)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes mobile menu having the wrong margin in pwa  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3826 (36451)
  • Fixes potential nil pointer when no container exists  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3828 (10705)
  • Fixes top padding for drawer in PWA mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3829 (31c51)
  • Fixes drawer being broken on pwa mode  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3832 (5616c)
  • Fixes icons on mobile for close  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3833 (4f912)
  • Fixes searching escaped html and by unescaping before searching  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3838 (54339)
  • deps:
  • Update dependency @intlify/unplugin-vue-i18n to ^6.0.7  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3822 (bea18)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3827 (55168)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3841 (effeb)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.12
entry.content:
üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes width login page  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3843 (95b27)
  • Adds html content type to index.html  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3845 (baf9f)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.13
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Supports multiple namespaces for k8s  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3848 (0e845)

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • Fixes total limit memory with multiple containers on the same host  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3842 (11bc1)
  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3847 (a13b7)
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3850 (2d3f6)
    View changes on GitHub

entry.title: New release for Dozzle: v8.12.14
entry.content:
üöÄ Features

  • Makes container name narrower on mobile  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3853 (e8d8b)
  • Updates dozzle logos and favicons  -  by @amir20 in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3858 (b961b) Shoutout to @iamdabe for the better logo üéâ üöÄ

   üêû Bug Fixes

  • deps:
  • Update all non-major dependencies  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3864 (2add1)
  • Update dependency daisyui to v5.0.35  -  in https://github.com/amir20/dozzle/issues/3869 (8e074)
    View changes on GitHub
